document_data.name: Dark-Eyed One
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dark-Eyed One''' was an adventurer and mage in the ruin of [[Spellgard]].
document_data.History: The Dark-Eyed One was an evil adventurer member of the [[Free Company of the Crescent]]. In [[1479 DR]], he went with his fellows to Spellgard hoping to find Lady [[Saharel]]'s treasures.
document_data.Personality: Nobody apart from [[Devlin]] knew the motives of the Dark-Eyed One or even his name. He followed Devlin's orders without question. He did not speak much with others but often he murmured to himself.
